𓅿 | duck, bird | 𓅭 𓏏

# Tier
𓅂 tyw طير (ṭīr) ܛܝܪܐ (ṭayrâ) طَائِر (ṭāʾir) тиртя (tirtya) 鳥 とり tori  [Tier](Tier) = bird >

Note the interchangeability of birds in these words:  
𓃀 𓂝 𓎛 [𓅌](𓅌.html) | inundation, flood | बाढ़ bāṛh  
𓃀 𓂝 𓎛 [𓅤](𓅤.html) | inundation, flood | बाढ़ bāṛh

𓃀 𓂝 𓎛 [𓅭](𓅭.html) 𓏳 | abundance | √poly  ⇔ प्लुति pluti plūdi pali flood

# extended

𒇻𒁍𒌓𒉣𒄷 udu-bu-adab [mušen](mušen.html) “a bird”  

𓄿 eagle < 𓅀 αἰγυπιός aigupiós <  γύψ gúps 𓅐  

aegithalos αἰγίθηλος a little song bird  

Bulis Βοῦλ-ις long-beaked bird that pecks out the eyes of fish. =>  pounx (πώυγξ) [phoenix](phoenix.html)  

to fear	тæрсын (tærsyn )		tearse dread
